snippet: We must end the federal programs that have militarized local police forces.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Elizabeth R Beavers and Michael Shank of the Friends Committee on National Legislation contends militarization of police evident in police response to protests in Ferguson, Mo, over death of Michael Brown has national implications; calls for end of federal programs that have contributed to militarization of police across the country.

byline.original: By ELIZABETH R. BEAVERS and MICHAEL SHANK

lead_paragraph: We must end the federal programs that have militarized local police forces.

headline.seo: Ferguson Shows the Risks of Militarized Policing
headline.main: Get the Military Off of Main Street
headline.print_headline: Get the Military Off of Main Street

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
